human_annot_guidelines.description: A breakdown of the presence and quality of human annotation guidelines provided for data labeling. Each label indicates whether it applies to the dataset, with supporting evidence from the paper.

Has Instructions.description: Human annotation guidelines include detailed instructions.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if this label applies to the dataset. If true, reference and reasoning must be provided.

reference.description: The location in the paper where these instructions are described (e.g., 'Section 4.1').

reasoning.description: Justification based on the paper content explaining why the human annotation guidelines include detailed instructions.

Has Rubrics.description: Human annotation guidelines include detailed rubrics.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if this label applies to the dataset. If true, reference and reasoning must be provided.

reference.description: The location in the paper where the rubrics are described (e.g., 'Section 4.2').

reasoning.description: Justification based on the paper content explaining why the human annotation guidelines include scoring rubrics.

Has Examples.description: Human annotation guidelines include clear examples.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if this label applies to the dataset. If true, reference and reasoning must be provided.

reference.description: The location in the paper where examples are shown (e.g., 'Appendix B').

reasoning.description: Justification based on the paper content explaining why the human annotation guidelines have some examples.

N/A.description: No human annotation guidelines are provided.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if the dataset has no human annotation guidelines. If true, reasoning must be provided.

reasoning.description: Justification based on the paper content explaining why no guidelines are considered present.
